name: Zucchini Carrot Muffins
description: These carrot zucchini muffins are moist, sweet, and healthy at the same time. They're perfect for a quick snack on the go or also for breakfast. Besides, they're vegan and can easily be made gluten-free!
recipeIngredient: 1 small zucchini, grated (squeeze out the water)

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, combine all dry ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium bowl, combine all dry ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the grated carrots, the apple, the zucchini, and the mashed banana. Stir in the almond or oat milk,the oil and about half of the chopped walnuts . Mix until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the grated carrots, the apple, the zucchini, and the mashed banana. Stir in the almond or oat milk,the oil and about half of the chopped walnuts . Mix until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Place 12 paper liners in a muffin tin and divide the mixture evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Place 12 paper liners in a muffin tin and divide the mixture evenly.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle with the rest of the walnuts.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle with the rest of the walnuts.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the muffins cool down in the muffin tin for at least half an hour before removing or eating them.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the muffins cool down in the muffin tin for at least half an hour before removing or eating them.

keywords: carrot muffins, zucchini carrot muffins, zucchini muffins
